title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
fullTitle: Star Trek: The Next Generation (TV Series 1987â€“1994)

episodes.title: The Best of Both Worlds Part II
episodes.plot: Having absorbed Captain Picard and his knowledge, the Borg head for Earth, leaving Riker and the Enterprise desperate for an unanticipated way to defeat them.

episodes.title: Family
episodes.plot: After defeating the Borg, the crew of the Enterprise experiences shore leave in various ways. Captain Picard's return to his family's vineyard in France has some extraordinary repercussions.

episodes.title: Brothers
episodes.plot: After an accident aboard the Enterprise leaves one of its children in grave danger, Data commandeers the Enterprise, driven to take the ship to an unknown origin, where an interesting figure awaits.

episodes.title: Suddenly Human
episodes.plot: On a rescue mission to an alien shipwrecked training mission, they discover one of its trainees to be a human.

episodes.title: Remember Me
episodes.plot: Dr. Crusher's fear of losing loved ones becomes real when her worries create an alternate reality.

episodes.title: Legacy
episodes.plot: The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crewmate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: When the leader of the Klingon High Council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf reunites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

episodes.title: Future Imperfect
episodes.plot: Riker awakens sixteen years after an away mission where he contracted a disease which destroyed his memory back to the point of infection - or so he's told.

episodes.title: Final Mission
episodes.plot: Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Captain Picard on a dangerous mission.

episodes.title: The Loss
episodes.plot: As an unknown force drags the Enterprise, Deanna Troi struggles with the loss of her empathic abilities.

episodes.title: Data's Day
episodes.plot: Data tries to comprehend the complex emotions between O'Brien and Keiko, who are about to be married.

episodes.title: The Wounded
episodes.plot: After being fired upon by a Cardassian vessel, Picard races against time to find out the facts behind the Cardassian commander's claim that the Federation attacked one of their outposts.

episodes.title: Devil's Due
episodes.plot: While answering a distress call, Picard finds himself not sure of exactly who he is dealing with, but he's sure he's not dealing with the planet's version of the Devil, as she claims to be.

episodes.title: Clues
episodes.plot: Effects of passing through a wormhole give the Enterprise crew a sense that they were unconscious for more than the thirty seconds they've been led to believe.

episodes.title: First Contact
episodes.plot: Disguised as an alien prior to First Contact, Will's life becomes imperiled when incurred injuries reveal his foreign internal structure to a xenophobic alien population.

episodes.title: Galaxy's Child
episodes.plot: As Geordi La Forge finally meets the real Dr. Leah Brahms, a tragic first contact leaves the Enterprise with a gigantic galactic infant suckling the ship's energy.

episodes.title: Night Terrors
episodes.plot: The Enterprise gets trapped in a Tyken's Rift, an energy-absorbing rupture in space, where all but Data, Troi and Guinan experience rising hallucinations and paranoia.

episodes.title: Identity Crisis
episodes.plot: Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge and an old friend fight to defeat a parasite that is trying to transform them into another species.

episodes.title: The Nth Degree
episodes.plot: When assigned to investigate an unknown probe, Lt. Barclay is hit by an energy surge, through a shuttlecraft's computer, and he receives an inexplicable boost of confidence and a vast increase in his knowledge.

episodes.title: Qpid
episodes.plot: Aiming to get out of Jean-Luc's debt, Q forces Capt. Picard and his officers to live out the Legend of Robin Hood - with a past acquaintance as Maid Marian.

episodes.title: The Drumhead
episodes.plot: A retired admiral boards the Enterprise in an effort to determine the actions aboard the ship surrounding an act of sabotage and possible treason.

episodes.title: Half a Life
episodes.plot: Counselor Troi's mother visits the Enterprise and becomes infatuated with a man whose culture forces him into a suicidal ritual called "The Resolution."

episodes.title: The Host
episodes.plot: Dr. Crusher falls for someone who's not at all what she expects him to be.

episodes.title: The Mind's Eye
episodes.plot: Geordi is brainwashed by the Romulans to start a war between the Klingons and the Federation

episodes.title: In Theory
episodes.plot: When a female crew member is infatuated with Lieutenant Commander Data, he decides to give a romantic relationship a try. Also, the Enterprise finds itself having to maneuver through a dangerous nebula.

episodes.title: Redemption
episodes.plot: Both Captain Picard and Lt. Worf must decide where their priorities lie as the Klingon Empire descends into a bitter civil war.
